citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:50AM and
12:40PM on 18-SEP-19.
Called all 3 contact numbers on file and left messages. Walked down to the kennel and no one was there.
Returned at 12:40 PM to see if the licensee had returned. Called all 3 contact numbers again and left messages.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:50AM and
12:40PM on 18-SEP-19.
Called all 3 contact numbers on file and left messages.  Walked down to the kennel and no one was there. 
Returned at 12:40 PM to see if the licensee had returned.  Called all 3 contact numbers again and left messages.
